content.text:
{
  "style": "serious",
  "spokenResponse": "Hey, can I take a moment to tell you something? I've been thinking a lot about how much you've been there for me during this difficult time at work. I really appreciate your unwavering support and understanding. You've been my rock, and I don't know what I'd do without you.",
  "noteDraft": "My dearest [Partner's Name],

As I reflect on the past few weeks, I am overwhelmed with gratitude for your steadfast support and compassion. During this challenging time at work, your presence has been a constant source of comfort and strength for me.

Your unwavering belief in me, your willingness to lend an ear, and your genuine concern for my well-being have been truly invaluable. I don't know what I'd do without you by my side, lifting me up and encouraging me to push forward.

Your love and understanding have been a beacon of light, guiding me through the darkness. I am so incredibly lucky to have you in my life, and I want you to know how deeply I cherish you and our relationship.

Thank you, my love, for being the rock that steadies me, the shoulder I can lean on, and the heart that beats in sync with mine. I am forever grateful for your support and the profound impact you have had on my life.

All my love,
[Your Name]",
  "tags": ["#love", "#appreciation", "#gratitude", "#support"]
}
